===Etymology===
Area word (rice culture originated in the south). Often compared with {{cog|hmx-pro|*mbləu||rice plant/paddy}}, whence {{cog|mww|nplej}}.

The relationship with similar-looking Mon-Khmer words is ambiguous; compare {{cog|vi|lúa||paddy rice}}.
